languages.text: "Тебя так ранила судьба Вигастиса и тех людей, кто умер из-за предательства Комиссара?"

traits.locale_text: "Тебя так ранила судьба Петера и тех людей, кто умер из-за предательства комиссара?"

languages.text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"
languages.original_text: "Тебя так ранила судьба Вигастиса и тех людей, кто умер из-за предательства Комиссара?"

traits.locale_text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"
"Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"
"Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"
"Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"
"Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"
"Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"

languages.text: 「ヴィガステスに起きたことと、コミッサーに裏切られた者たちの死のことで、取り乱しているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィガステスに起きたことと、コミッサーに裏切られた者たちの死のことで、取り乱しているのか？」

languages.text: “是因为维加斯特落得了那样的下场，还有那些人遭到了政委的出卖，才让你这么难过吗？”
languages.original_text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"

traits.locale_text: “是因为维加斯特落得了那样的下场，还有那些人遭到了政委的出卖，才让你这么难过吗？”

languages.text: «¿Está consternada por el destino de Vigastes y la muerte de los traicionados por el Comisario?».
languages.original_text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Está consternada por el destino de Vigastes y la muerte de los traicionados por el Comisario?».

languages.text: "Seid Ihr verärgert wegen Vigastes' Schicksal und dem Tod der Leute, die der Kommissar verraten hat?"
languages.original_text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr verärgert wegen Vigastes' Schicksal und dem Tod der Leute, die der Kommissar verraten hat?"

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qui vous bouleverse ainsi ? Serait-ce à cause de ce qui est arrivé à Vigastes et de la mort de ceux qu'a trahis le commissaire ? »
languages.original_text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qui vous bouleverse ainsi ? Serait-ce à cause de ce qui est arrivé à Vigastes et de la mort de ceux qu'a trahis le commissaire ? »

languages.text: "Huzursuzluğunun sebebi, Vigastes'in kaderi ve Komiser'in sırtından bıçakladıklarının ölümü mü?"
languages.original_text: "Are you distraught because of Vigastes's fate and the deaths of those betrayed by the Commissar?"

traits.locale_text: "Huzursuzluğunun sebebi Vigastes'in kaderi ve Komiser'in sırttan bıçakladıklarının ölümü mü?"
